ModMetaData.name: NightVision
ModMetaData.author: drumad
ModMetaData.description: -Night vision: No slow down in darkness (Apparel, Bionics, Races) -Photosensitivity: Faster in darkness, slower in bright light (Bionics, Races; Apparel can remove the debuff) -Includes corresponding positive or negative thoughts -[New] Combat effects: light now affects ranged and melee hit chance, ranged cooldown, melee dodge, and adds a melee sneak attack chance. -Supports Alien races (e.g. add natural photosensitivity to your favourite race) -Customisable settings for apparel (e.g. add night vision to the cowboy hat) -Customisable settings for bionics and health conditions (e.g. add a custom buff to Luciferium for both bright light and darkness)
